mapper.insert: insert into databaselab.adminhumanresources (ILevel, IILevel, IIILevel,PositionType,JobTitle) values (#{ILevel},#{IILevel},#{IIILevel},#{PositionType},#{JobTitle});
mapper.update: update databaselab.adminhumanresources set ILevel=#{ILevel},IILevel = #{IILevel},IIILevel = #{IIILevel},PositionType = #{PositionType},JobTitle = #{JobTitle} where id = #{id};
